title: Novo Nordisk sinks 10% after weight loss drug fails to match Eli Lilly's in trial
summary_full: Novo Nordisk stock fell as much as 10% Monday after it said its next-generation weight loss drug didn't meet its primary target.
summary_public: Novo Nordisk stock fell as much as 10% Monday after it said its next-generation weight loss drug didn't meet its primary target.
